description: This tasty Cranberry Jalapeno Margarita combines homemade cranberry juice, jalapeno simple syrup, and tequila. This cocktail has just the right amount of sweetness from the cranberry juice, spice from jalapeño tequila, and tartness from lime juice. Cheers to the holidays!Chill Time: 2 hrs
keywords: How To Make Jalapeño Cranberry Margarita
